name: Express Delivery
description: You will get super fast delivery with in a day. We deliver couriers all over Bangladesh. We will make the delivery with in 24 hours

name: Regular Delivery
description: You will get regular delivery with in 2 to 3 days. We deliver couriers all over Bangladesh. We will make the delivery with in 72 hours

name: Weeklong Delivery
description: You will get the delivery with in a week. We deliver couriers all over Bangladesh. We will make the delivery with in a week

name: Scheduled Delivery
description: You will get a scheduled recurring delivery on a monthly basis. This is for entreprenuers and business owners who regularly use courier services to send and receive items. We deliver couriers all over Bangladesh.

name: Special Delivery
description: You will get special delivery for someone special. We deliver couriers all over Bangladesh. We will make the delivery with in 24 hours. We will pack your items with attractive covering free of charge in this package.

name: Secret Delivery
description: You will get a secret delivery with 3 days. We deliver couriers all over Bangladesh. We will make the delivery with in 3 days
